title: Further darken border and background of feature pills in hero section

requirements.summary: Significantly increase the border darkness and background opacity of the three feature pill elements in the Hero component to make them much more visible and prominent
acceptanceCriteria: The border of all three feature pills ('100% Natural Millets', 'Women-Led', 'Farmer Support') is significantly darker than the current implementation
The background opacity of all three feature pills is substantially increased for better visibility
All three pills maintain consistent styling with each other
The pills remain readable and visually distinct against the hero background image
The styling changes apply to both mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Modify the styling of the three feature pill elements ('100% Natural Millets', 'Women-Led', 'Farmer Support') to significantly darken their borders and increase their background opacity. Update the border color classes to use darker shades and increase the background opacity value to make the pills substantially more visible and prominent against the hero background image while maintaining readability and consistent styling across all three pills for both mobile and desktop viewports.
